BattleEffectText.Name: Contractual Obligation: Liberty
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, randomize the Costs of all Combat Pages whose original Cost is 3 or less. If the character plays any Combat Page whose Cost is {0}, lose 25% HP at the end of the Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Contractual Obligation: Amplification
BattleEffectText.Desc: When playing Combat Pages whose Cost is {0} (randomly determined between 0 to 3 each Scene), their dice gain +3 Power. Other pages lose 3 Power.

BattleEffectText.Name: Contractual Obligation: Swiftness
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain 3 Haste. For each one-sided attack performed in a Scene, apply 1 Feeble and Disarm to self next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Contractual Obligation: Might
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, gain 2 Strength. If the character uses a Combat Page that has 2 or more non-Counter Offensive dice, become Staggered next Scene.

BattleEffectText.Name: Contractual Obligation: Light
BattleEffectText.Desc: At the start of the Scene, fully restore Light. At the end of the Scene, take damage equal to 10% of Max HP for every point of Light remaining.

BattleEffectText.Name: Sealing Barrier
BattleEffectText.Desc: Cannot act. Targetable by librarians. Once Staggered, the barrier dissolves.
